text: Kattassery Joseph Yeshudas (born 10 January 1940) is an Indian playback singer, actor and musician. He sings Indian classical and cinematic songs. Yeshudas has recorded more than 50,000 songs. ==Discography== ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Indian composers Category:Indian musicians Category:Indian singers Category:Indian movie actors Category:Malayali people
title: K. J. Yesudas
